metadata.title: CVE-2020-22650 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A memory leak vulnerability in sim-organizer.c of AlienVault Ossim v5causes a denial of service (DOS) via a system crash triggered by theoccurrence of a large number of alarm events.

criterions.comment: ossim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
